channel.title: Ruiming on Ruiming's Site
channel.description: Recent content in Ruiming on Ruiming's Site

item.description: I’m a second-year graduate student in computer science at University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA). I’m working on multi-parametric MRI analysis in Magnetic Resonance Research Labs, Radiology, advised by Prof. Kyung Hyun Sung and co-advised by Prof. Fabien Scalzo. I graduated with B.S. in computer science and in applied mathematics at UCLA in 2017. During my undergrad, I worked on knowledge graph parsing/explainable AI supervised by Prof. Song-Chun Zhu.
